DOC.brief_summary: This study design collect data precipitate factor , diagnosis , morbidity , therapy , quality life , symptom severity , etc . information patient fibromyalgia .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients fulfil 1990 2010 ACR criterion fibromyalgia recruit Fibromyalgia outpatient service belong Department Rheumatism . Except collect patient ' demographic social characteristic information , rheumatologist also carry comprehensive evaluation include patient current history , current medication use , tender point examination diagnosis confirmation fibromyalgia treatment recommendation . Patients fibromyalgia ask fill set questionnaire evaluate quality life , symptoms severity , quality sleep emotion . The study conduct Beijing , China .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old . Fulfills American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) 1990 classification criterion Fibromyalgia . Fulfills American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) 2010 classification criterion Fibromyalgia . Do n't fulfill classification criterion Fibromyalgia .
